Feature: As a User I want to view the retrieved calculations from the store so that I can view the reference to the calculation
Scenario Outline: Retrieve calculation results of a taxpayer with valid identifiers &amp#27;[90m# src/test/resources/features/calculatorstore/CalculatorStore.feature:6&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mGiven A <type> unique identifier of taxpayer <taxpayerId> exists&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd <type> unique identifier of the calculation <calcId> exists&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mWhen I get <taxpayerId>,<calcId>&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mThen I should see the response status code as <statusCode>&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd I should see the following entities in the response body&amp#27;[0m
Examples:
